short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate grouping of search results, filter results to match your search words, then sort results by price or price per count.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search for any item on Amazon. When the search results return, a box called Amazon Sort will be added. Choose how many pages you want to automate, then choose if you want the title to be filtered by your search words. Click the 'Go!' button and wait for the automatic page collection to add those items to memory. Once finished the items will be filtered and sorted by price or price per count, then displayed. Enjoy!
